LinkedEarth is a community-driven initiative dedicated to advancing paleoclimate science through open data sharing, collaborative research, and digital tools. We bring together paleoclimate experts and data scientists to extract more information about Earth's past climates, with the goal of better informing its future.

### Offerings

<div style="font-size: 0.9em;">

- **[Data Curation](data/)**: Data standards and compilations supporting comprehensive analysis
- **[Analysis Tools](tools/)**: Open-source software supporting this analysis
- **[Community Support](community/)**: Collaborative environment for researchers and students alike
- **[Training Resources](training/)**: Workshops, tutorials, and educational materials

</div>
